text: Phyllis Hyman (July 6, 1949 â€“ June 30, 1995) was an American actress and singer. She was born in Philadelphia. She performed pop and R&B; music. She starred in the movie School Daze (1988). Her music was mainly melancholy from 1984 and afterwards. She killed herself with drugs and pentobarbital in her apartment in New York City on June 30, 1995. Three years after her death, a record, Forever with You, was released with other songs she had recorded before her death. title: Phyllis Hyman
